title: the Screening of Third Country Transactions Act 2023 (No. 28 of 2023) and the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Screening of Third Country Transactions
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Screening of Third Country Transactions 

Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited screening third country transaction act 2023 (commencement) order 2024

title: the Screening of Third Country Transactions Act 2023 (No. 28 of 2023) and the
heading: 2. The 6th day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 6th day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
Screening of Third Country Transactions Act 2023 (No. 28 of 2023) shall come 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
17 December, 2024. 

DARA CALLEARY 
 Minister of State at the Department of 
 Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [714] 3
